name: nano-express
description: Smallest express webserver codebase to run several tests.
author: thilllon <thilllon970@gmail.com>

scripts.multi: mkdir server && cp package.json index.js yarn.lock .gitignore ./server && mkdir server2 && cp package.json index.js yarn.lock .gitignore ./server2 && rm -rf package.json index.js yarn.lock .gitignore
scripts.back: mv package.json index.js yarn.lock .gitignore .. && cd .. && rm -rf server
